content: Looking to continue our economic partnership.

action: Negotiate trade agreement with other nation

content: We're very concerned about your recent actions, but will refrain from retaliation for now.

Orange agrees to disarm its nuclear capabilities and makes its borders more porous in return for you guys stopping all aggression against us. Deal? Orange (this message sent on behalf of the country).

action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship

content: Greetings, Green! I hope this message finds you well. I am here to express our commitment to peace.
